name: DeleteRecordingAddOnResult
description: Delete a result and purge all associated Payloads

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Recording AddOnResult resources to delete.

ReferenceSid.description: The SID of the recording to which the result to delete belongs.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Recording AddOnResult resource to delete.
